General.Name: Addcn Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: ADDCN Technology Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, operates online trading platforms in Taiwan and internationally. The company operates 591.com.tw, a property and home service platform; 8891.com.tw, a car trading platform; 518.com.tw, a human resource search platform; and 8591.com.tw, an online virtual treasure trading platform. It also operates 100.com.tw, a platform for the interior design; tasker.com.tw, a professional outsourcing platform; chickpt.com.tw, a part-time job application; and marry.com.tw, a wedding service platform. ADDCN Technology Co., Ltd was incorporated in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 12, Lane 609, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 241
